content.label: please update for iphonex

I love the design and colors and story line.  Well done.  My only wish, especially as I purchased the game so I own my copy, is that I have no way to earn ohnz coins faster.  Items using ohnz coins are expensive but rewards for quests are cheap...only one per quest.  Why can't I purchase more coin or maybe the quest levels should pay more depending on their level.  Other than that this is the best game I have found in a long time.  Hope you are creating more.  Oh and I found this game at number three in the series and can't find the others at the App Store...is there a reason why they are no longer available?

Chaos Rings is an App Store gem. I’m a little disappointed it didn’t get more attention. But it’s got story, good gameplay, customization; and while the main character may just be a Sora clone, that’s really my only complaint. When it first came out there were glitches, but to my knowledge they’ve all been fixed. 
I just wish the earlier games were still available. So yeah! Good game! Highly recommend it!
This is by far the best game I’ve ever played on the iPhone I need the sequel

Devs take note not all games have to contain in app purchases. This game was $20.00 which to some might seem like a lot but it is indeed worth it. It is extremely polished and feels like it could’ve been released on the ps2 along with FinalFantasyX. The story along with the gameplay are amazing! Squareenix I just hope you continue to release great games like this that again don’t cost more than your average game on the App Store but give you a real console game with no in app purchases ( which with a lot of games will cost you more) great work on this masterpiece!

title.label: awesome. Want to play the older ones.

content.label: Absolutely worth every penny. Got sunk into the story line, almost couldn't put it down. Great game, can't wait for the next one. But also please add the old ones to the store again, I missed the chance to play them and it’d be awesome to experience their story, I’d gladly pay for them.

title.label: Wish they made more like this

content.label: (Edit) <There's a glitch that force closes when using analyze. I kept trying to use it in magma ocean and it forced closed each time. Please fix.> For once I actually feel like the game I payed for is worth every penny. They put so much work into this and if they just made a game with this much effort every so often for the mobile market, they could change mobile gaming forever. It's like having one of the final fantasy's for ps2 but on your mobile device. Amazing story, balanced gameplay, lots of stuff to do and it's not short like I expected. I'm so pleased with Square Enix and this game that words can't describe how pleasing this game is to me. PLEASE square, put this much time into mobile games more often and I promise you that you'll make so much money and give so many people hope for mobile gaming. It's the first time I feel like square didn't con somebody out of money. Keep it up guys and you have my bills on an product of this caliber.
Good ties of lore within game, such as playing Leon's son. Detailed vast world with a modern twist on ff gameplay!

great game and very nice soundtrack; one gripe though, please make this game compatible with iphone x; there’s no way to exit the game with iphone x besides doing a force power shutdown (no home button, swiping up to exit the game doesn’t work); fingers crossed that the developers will address this issue

Flat out one of the best rpgs I've played on iOS.
No cloud saves? 😡

title.label: Please bring back the previous Chaos Rings titles :)

content.label:
I feel that the Chaos Rings series is a bit underrated, and should be right up there with the other "non Final Fantasy" titles/series like Dragon Quest, the Mana series, etc.

I've played through the very first Chaos Rings, and I immediately fell in love with it.
And when I first saw the trailers for Chaos Rings III, I was ecstatic.
However, life happens every now and then, and I unfortunately wasn't able to play through the other 2 titles (Chaos Rings Omega and Chaos Rings II) -- though I did purchase them.
Now that I finally have time, I am unable to run the previous Chaos Rings titles, as they have been pulled from the App Store.

It would be great if these wonderful games could be updated to run on current mobile operating systems.

Thank you, and keep on creating, Square Enix! :)

I love this game so much I play it almost everyday, A year to be exact and it's worth the price of it but one day I just happened to open up the game to find that my files had deleted and all the time that I put into the game had just vanished like that. I would really hope if I could get my files back to continue playing not to mention that I spend money to buy this game :(

Truly an amazing game I love the story the gameplay is amazing I just have one regret I dissent get the other chaos rings games but someday I hope they can rerelease them for iOS I would gladly buy them in a heartbeat I hope they do an update for them if they do release the games to support iOS 7 and above I this had a higher rating system I would rate the games with 100 stars

i bought the first Chaos Rings but didn't get the second in time before it was pulled from the app store. needless to say i'm a big supporter of the series so when the forth installment came out, i waited two years to buy it. People who think this game is expensive are right however, it is also Four times bigger than the first one and four times the characters.. The gameplay is also more refined from the first one, with  more summoners that can also be leveled up. How this game differentiates from the first is the it is in full 3-D and is more immersive/ interactive! 
     Overall, The $20 price-tag is expensive, but considering that the game is more immersive with full3D, has extensive characters/environments, is 75+ hours long where most other mobile games are only 4-5 hours long and is specifically made for mobile more than justifies the cost! I can't wait for the direct sequel to Chaos Rings 3!!!

Pros: a solid single player game on ios, good rpg that doesnt have any iap, whether they are the expensive kind or the points for sale cheap kind, that you buy points and use them in game. That in itself is rare to find on the ios app store.
Cons: leary and elroux have small breasts, need to give them an upgrade. Con 2: main character and his outfit look ripped from kh series, his arms also need some muscle, not a lot, but some so he doesnt look same model as the girls. Con 3: needs a way to get more ohnz besides doing quests over and over, like a npc or store that you can exchange mh for ohnz, or give us more than 1 ohnz as reward from quests. Con 4: some of the items, cards skill ability descriptions need a spellchecker and proofreader.
Con 5: not sure if the achievements are working on ios, when i hit achievements in options screen, it takes me to a screen that say achievements unavailable and says rate it and facebook likes unavailable. Please fix.
I finally downloaded cr 3 and am enjoying it a lot, please bring back the earlier games in the series, ill buy them. lol 
Also found a bug that is similar to the earlier reported magma ocean/infared camera bug that jellyaintjamming reported in an earlier review. If you go to winter wonderland blizzard area and encounter a snow dragon and use analzye on it it crashes to desktop or the main screen of your ios device. I say it may be similar, because they both are triggered by infared camera or analyze, which is basically the same game effect. Also sometimes during the hunts in winter wonderland it also crashes randomly, can't figure out the cause yet. Hope you guys can fix these bugs and crashes soon.

Worth every penny, covers everything I'd like to see in a portable game:
Nice graphics
Great story
Fun gameplay
Absolute Masterpiece.
I was not expecting such an immersive game and rich storyline. Really great

title.label: It really doesn't get much better than this

content.label: If you are on the fence about this game, buy it. This price is a steal for a game of this magnitude. Heck, $40 would still be a steal. It's fantastic, and is definitely one of the best video games I have ever played.

Best game ever absolutely still my favorite in 2017 I love it so much
New game plus!

The original Chaos Rings games will always hold a special place in my heart, but Chaos Rings 3 is my new favorite. The character development, changing story line, and the music are amazing. I love the gene system and the overall gameplay. My only problem is the silent main character and the difficulty of acquiring ohnz coins. I love the references to the earlier games and the hidden little Easter eggs you find as you talk to npcs throughout the game. Mixing the original music with the new music is also awesome and so nostalgic!

title.label: Amazing RPG for mobile! Fixed for iPhone SE

content.label:
Omg thanks so much for fixing this for the iPhone SE! I can't wait to start playing this game again 

In par with the likes of final fantasy games <3

I'm hoping Square Enix pulls a Chaos Rings II when they released additional stories to the game months after its first release. The third Chaos Rings seems a little incomplete... please continue the story!!

This feels like an older generation turn based JRPG game, which is amazing to me. This game is similar to Persona in several aspects. If I had to describe this game in a few words it would be touching, light hearted, and dark in ways.

Now the storyline itself is kind of dark but it's presented in a light hearted way. It basically revolves around friendship is power, humanity is twisted, and fate of the world lies on you. Kind of typical actually. What kept me interested was the diversity of personalities, the mystery behind characters, and how they fit into the story. The entire game is English subbed with Japanese voiceovers.

What gameplay should you expect on a daily basis? Repetitive side quests, arena experience grind, collecting gifts in dungeons, and then there is the main story line. I find myself talking to all the same NPCs repeatedly or doing side quests every time the story progresses a little there are details you miss out on if you focus too much on just the main quests. 

What I enjoyed about the music was how the main OST was presented. It made a strong impact on how certain scenes were felt. It's not so much that the music itself made the difference but it's more about how the story builds up to a certain point, how you've worked for so hard to reach somewhere, and it turns out to be this touching scene.

I don't have anything bad to say except the repetitiveness can grow tiring, but what game doesn't have some repetition to it? Also, usually I don't mind when the protagonist is silent but for some reason I wish he would speak in this game. I think the reason being is because I feel as if some scenes would be more emotional if he just spoke instead of standing there all silent. Imagine playing Kingdom Hearts but Sora never talks.

Overall I enjoyed this game a lot I give it a 5/5. If you enjoy most JRPGs out there I recommend this game.

I've been using an iPhone 5 but then got a iPhone SE         
and and when I installed the game on my new phone and launched it, it doesn't fit my screen

NEGATIVE:  ALL AUDIO AND DIALOGUE IS IN JAPANESE!  However, the text is English. This is pretty lame on Square Enix's part. 

POSITIVE: This is a solid follow-up to Chaos Rings II and I. The combat system follows that introduced in CR2 and is slightly improved to be applicable to the CR3 contexts/worlds. Graphics are good and overall controls aren't bad. If you can get past all audio in Japanese then this should make for an entertaining game for you.
Johannes is Al from the future

title.label: Great game, amazing story - worth the price tag

content.label: I am amazed at the quality of the game, art, intuitive gaming experience that was created for this game, as well as CR2. Not as challenging as the older FF series, but given the limited engagement of user interactions on mobile - it was very well thought.  Incredible story, as is with most Square games, definitely beats FF13.  This game really deserves more coverage, and if you're contemplating the purchase (took me a week to decide to buy this game), it's definitely worth it.

I really liked it!! 
Hope we see more like this RPG!! :3
Previous issue was that the game wasn't optimized for the iPhone 6 Plus. Just got a iPhone SE and the problem is still optimization. The scaling is way off.
One of my all-time favorite games for any platform, much less mobile. :)
app is 100% silent.

I love this game and had tons of fun playing it but I let me nephew play on it for a while came back and this game was deleted so I re downloaded it and when I opened it my save game was gone I was wondering if there is a way to fix it or not

title.label: I prefer it over FF7, FF10

content.label: Honestly, the story and the music is the best that I've come across the many FF and Chaos Rings games that I've played.  Game play is a bit m'eh, but still better than the likes of FF13. It's just FF, imho (all the FF archetypes are here), and the very best, imho.  It's a shame that this game doesn't get more press.

If you are going to jack up the prices of all your apps which are just ported from iso's of your games.At least make them compatible with the current version of iOS or delete them off of the App Store. This is so annoying over something simple... if you discontinue updates for something then remove it... We cannot downgrade to play the items we've purchased!

Man hands one of the funniest square Enix franchises in the App Store and this one definitely adds up to the others.  Some Weapons are very unique and cool to look at.  Story is ok for now.  I haven't gotten too far into the game but I'm sure the story will grow. Genes are pretty cool.  Again I haven't gotten far but hopefully you can upgrade the star ranks.  And hopefully at least 2 more characters come into play... Looks like there is tho.   And I'm not giving it five stars simply because the voices are Japanese.  We waited this long for this update square.....at least update to English dub.

This an amazing game worthy of being for a console. It blows my mind how great the story, graphics, cutscenes, and the size of this game are. I wish there was a theater mode or something where u can rewatch cutscenes or go over the story so far and a cross save function  but other than that, it a phenomenal game that i will probably never delete.

I was waiting to purchase this game as I read there were issues with the last version, so I was pleasantly surprised to see it finally working. I'm about 2 hours in and I'm really enjoying it. It has a kingdom hearts kind of feel to it which I really enjoy for a change. The only issue I have is with the currency system, but in a way it keeps you from binging on the game so it lasts longer. Definitely of console quality, and could have easily been labeled final fantasy

I honestly love this game, to me this game has that fantasy over world everyone dreams of, not to mention an amazing soundtrack and a story that stands up against final fantasy and xenoblade and each of the main characters are amazing, Leary being my favorite, I'd say that if you want something to enjoy for a couple months than get this wonderful game.
Thank you for fixing that bug. This game is great well worth the money you won't be disappointed.
